permission_gate.explanation: Photoseed needs access to your photos and videos to display the gallery, allow file import, and create backups. Please grant the permissions.
permission_gate.denied_message: Permissions are still not granted. You must allow them to use the app.
permission_gate.permanently_denied_message: Permissions have been permanently denied. To continue, you must enable them in the app settings. You may need to restart the app after changing settings.
